Package net.minecraftforge.client.model.lighting

Class ForgeModelBlockRenderer

java.lang.Object
net.minecraft.client.renderer.block.ModelBlockRenderer
net.minecraftforge.client.model.lighting.ForgeModelBlockRenderer
public class ForgeModelBlockRenderer extends ModelBlockRenderer
Wrapper around ModelBlockRenderer to allow rendering blocks via Forge's lighting pipeline.
